channel.title: Npc drop help? please!
channel.description: OK, so i have a little problem, i need to make an npc drop a certain amount of noted sharks, but how would i do that since u cant add ammounts to item2? can any1 help? im using project czar source and the npc is a hill giant. please help! Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 10:42:23 AM[/size][hr]any 1?

item.title: Npc drop help? please!
item.dc:creator: @sexytimee sexytimee
item.description:
@sexytimee wrote:

Just go to npcdrops.cfg

npcdrop = (npcid) (itemid) (amount) (droprate)

npcdrop = 117 386 100 100

That would be for 100 sharks every killâ€¦
Is that what you needed?

Read full topic
